sentence.Network_en: The hotel is decorated imaginatively and attractively.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾馆装修别具一格，赏心悦目。

sentence.Network_en: The university imparts information, but it imparts it imaginatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 大学提供信息, 但它是富于想象力地提供信息.

sentence.Network_en: The room was decorated very imaginatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间装饰得非常富有想象力.

entry.tran: 富于想象力的;有独创性的
entry.def: If you describe someone or their ideas as imaginative, you are praising them because they are easily able to think of or create new or exciting things.

example.ex: ...hundreds of cooking ideas and imaginative recipes...
example.tran: 成百上千个烹饪点子和富有创意的食谱

auth_sentence.content: Material is imaginatively chosen and interpreted.

auth_sentence.content: "We remain resolute and will work tirelessly and imaginatively with every community in London to solve this crime," he stressed.
